response.overview: Grace is a young lady with a loving suitor, Francis, on her neck. But she consistently puts him on hold to sort out issues of the past. However, Francis is willing to wait no matter how long it takes. The relationship surviving all sorts of bumps, Grace finds herself unable to resist Francis' charms for too long. But at the moment she is about to give in, she receives a call that changes everything.
response.title: STRANDED
